text: I have a weird problem with passing a callback function pointer (returned by `@cfunction`) to a shared library. The function pointer is passed to the library via a field of a structure.  I have added a test function to the shared library that calls the callback function stored in the structure.  I can `ccall` this test function from Julia and the Julia callback function gets called as expected without problems, but when it comes time for the library to call the same callback function it segfaults even though the callback function pointer has the same value as when called from the test function.  Any ideas on what could be going wrong or how to debug this?
